feed.title: Allen Akinkunle | Data Science, Machine Learning, Data Visualisation, Software Development

entry.title: Exploratory Analysis of the Washington's Post Police Shooting dataset using R and Plotly
entry.content: The Washington Post has been compiling a database of fatal shootings in the United States by police officers in the line of duty since January 1, 2015. The dataset contains information such as the date and the state in which the killing occurred, the age, gender...
